sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; export default function ViewIssueModal({ issue, onClose }) { if (!issue) return null; return (

Issue Details

Reported By

NT ID: {issue.ntId}

Email: {issue.email}

Project Details

Project Name: {issue.projectName}

Customer: {issue.customerName}

Rated Power: {issue.ratedPower} kW

Rated Speed: {issue.ratedSpeed} rpm

Application: {issue.application}

Legislation: {issue.legislation}

FIE System: {issue.fieSystem}

EGT System: {issue.egtSystem}

Fuel Type: {issue.fuelType}

Issue Type: {issue.issueType}

Issue Description

{issue.description}

{issue.files?.length > 0 && (

Attachments

    {issue.files.map((file) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)} {issue.solutions?.length > 0 && (

Solved By

NT ID: {issue.solutions[0].solvedBy}

Solution

Description: {issue.solutions[0].description}

)}
); }
